. <app><lem wit="#A">astri</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">estri</rdg><rdg wit="#H">istri</rdg></app> laraṅan sakalih, rara
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">hulañjar, bisi</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> bisi</rdg></app> kəna ku
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">haloan</lem><rdg wit="#H">hulun</rdg></app> <pb edRef="#A" n="9v"/> si paṅhavanan, makaṅuni ṅarovaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">taṅan, sapaṅluṅguhan</lem><rdg wit="#B">taṅan, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
490 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">di cataṅ</lem><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, di bale,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">di təpas</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, patutuṅgalan, haloan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">si paṅluṅguhan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>guḥhan</rdg></app> ṅaranna, patañjər-tañjər di pipir, di buruan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">patutuṅgalan, ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">patutuṅgalan, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> haloan si
. <app><lem type="norm">panataran</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">panahtaran</rdg></app> ṅaranna, nembalan nu batuk, nu ṅadehem, nu ṅarəhak,
495 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">makaṅuni</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> makaṅuni</rdg><rdg wit="#H">maṅkaṅuni</rdg></app> ambu iṅ kalih ṅavih, ya ləmbu
. <app><lem type="emn">aṅgala</lem><rdg wit="#A">Agalaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">Aṁgalaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">akalaṅ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ñanda di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">urut saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">rut saṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Urut <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> hyaṅ kalih dəuk, di tihaṅ, di kayu, di batu, ñəəṅ iña aṅgəs diri disilihan ñanda, ṅaranna ləmbu
. <app><lem type="emn">aṅgasir</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">Aṅgasin·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>sin</rdg></app>, itu keh na
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">iṅətkənən</lem><rdg wit="#A">Iṅətkən·</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Iṅət·kənən:a</rdg></app>, lamun dek
500 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">luput ti</lem><rdg wit="#B">luput <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> naraka.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_05.02">saṅuni sapaṅinəpan, sapamajikan, satəpas, sabale, dəṅ saṅ hyaṅ kalih,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">dəṅ astri</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">deṅ estri</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> Astri</rdg></app> laraṅan sakalih, ṅaranna kəbo
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">sapitunahan</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">sapinahan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">iña</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">ña</rdg></app>
505 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">keh na</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" quantity="2" unit="character"/></rdg></app> iṅətkənən,<pb edRef="#A" n="10r"/> sinaṅguh ulah pamali ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_05.03"><app><lem wit="#H">kitu keh lamun uraṅ dek paparan, hayva</lem><rdg wit="#B">kitu keḥ lamu Uraṁ dek· paparran·</rdg><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">Itu hayva</rdg></app>, ulah dek <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">diturut</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">katurut·</rdg></app> ku hulun sakalih, lamun
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">uraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">Uraṁ ma</rdg></app> dek maan iña ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">maka</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">maṅka</rdg></app> majar ka paṅhulu<app><lem wit="#A #B">-tandaṅna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">-tandaṅ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">lamunna</rdg></app>
510 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">kapicaya</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">dipicaya</rdg></app> ma, samayakən, ku
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">gəriṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">gərəṅna</rdg></app>, ku paehna, ku ləṅitna,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">poroc</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">poron</rdg></app> mati
. <app><lem wit="#B">sareyana eta ma</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">saryenana Eta</rdg><note>Cf. SKK 11.17 <foreign>kitu lamun uraṅ hayaṅ ñaho di sareyana eta ma, panday taña</foreign>.</note></app>, baan, hamo tu aya na pidosaən,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ja</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">kena</rdg></app> kolot na samaya
515 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">manan na</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">na nini</rdg></app> agama, hamo ma dipicaya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ulah,
. <app><lem wit="#A">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H #EdASD" cause="morphological">lamun</rdg></app> kədə ma dek maan iña, gəriṅ ma nuluṅ, paeh ləṅit ma
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">ṅagantyan</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅagatyan</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṅagatyin</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">sakadəgdəgna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">sakadədəgna</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">samaṅkana kayatnakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṁmaṁkana kayatnakna</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">samaṁkanakan yatna-yatna</rdg><rdg wit="#H">samaṅkana kayatna-yatna</rdg></app>.</p>
520 </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="6" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_06">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Taking Pleasure in Work</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_06.01">nihan muvah jaga raṅ kadataṅan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ku same, paṅuraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">ku menak ku rama, ku paṅuraṅ</rdg></app>, dasa, calagara, upəti, paṅgərəs rəma, maka suka
525 <app><lem wit="#EdASD">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">giI</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">gəI</rdg></app> uraṅ, maka
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rasa</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">asa</rdg></app> kadataṅan ku
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kula-kadaṅ, ku baraya</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kulakadaṅ baraya</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ku adi lañcək, anak
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mitra</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">mintra</rdg></app> suvan ka<pb edRef="#A" n="10v"/>ponakan, sakitu eta
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">kaṅkənna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kaṅkən</rdg></app>,
530 <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">ṅan lamun aya paṅhaat uraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, kicap inum
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">simbut</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sibut</rdg></app> cavət
. <app><lem type="emn">sakadrəbya</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">sukadrəbya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>drəbyi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">maka</lem><rdg wit="#B">maṁka</rdg><rdg wit="#H">maṅku</rdg></app> rasa
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">puja ñaṅraha</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">puja ñaṅgraha</rdg><rdg wit="#H">paṅñaṅraha</rdg></app>, ka
535 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> ka devata.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_06.02"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#B">agəs</rdg></app> ma jaga raṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">digunakən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">dipigunakən</rdg></app>, ka gaga ka savah, ka seraṅ agəṅ, ṅikis, marigi,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ṅadaṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅaburaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg><rdg wit="#H">dəṅ ṅaburaṅ</rdg></app>, marak,
540 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">munday</lem><rdg wit="#A">muday</rdg><rdg wit="#B">muyda</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅadodoger</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ṅadoger</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">mapayaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">maṁpayaṁ</rdg></app>, ñair
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD">biñcaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">bicaṁ</rdg></app>, siṅ savatək guna tohaan, ulah suṅsut, ulah surah, ulah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">purik</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">purit</rdg></app> dəṅ
545 <app><lem wit="#A">gariṅsiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">garisiṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">giriṅsiṅ</rdg></app>, pahi
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">suka<pb edRef="#B" n="2r"/>kən</lem><rdg wit="#B">suka<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg></app> sareyanana, maka rasa guna uraṅ.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="7" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_07">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Travel Etiquette</head>
550 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_07.01">ṅan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamu</rdg></app> uraṅ pulaṅ ka dayəh<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ulah ṅisiṅ di
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">piṅgir</lem><rdg wit="#A">pigir</rdg></app> jalan, di sisi imah di
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">tuṅtuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">tutuṁ</rdg></app> caaṅna, bisi
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kaambə</lem><rdg wit="#B">kaAbə</rdg></app> ku menak
555 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ku gusti</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">ku gusti ku mantri</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">saṅuni</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">suṅuni</rdg><rdg wit="#B">maṅuni</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">tu ku</lem><rdg wit="#B">ku</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">tuṅku</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">tuku</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> nu
. <app><lem type="emn">buṅah-baṅah</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD">roṅaḥ-roṅaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">balaṅah-balaṅah</rdg></app>, bisi
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kasumpah</lem><rdg wit="#B">kasupah</rdg></app>
560 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">kapadahkən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kapadakən</rdg></app>, ambu bapa
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paṅguruan</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">pagurvan</rdg></app>, kapapas
. <app><lem type="emn">ku</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">ka</rdg></app> nu karolot, ku tvah uraṅ gagabah, ṅan lamun <pb edRef="#A" n="11r"/>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">nurut</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><supplied reason="omitted">carek</supplied></rdg><note>The word <foreign>nurut</foreign> escaped ASD’s attention, so that they supplied the word <foreign>carek</foreign>.</note></app> saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">siksa ma</lem><rdg wit="#B">sisa</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">siksa</rdg></app>,
565 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">ṅisiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅisi</rdg></app> ma tujuh
. <app><lem wit="#A">ləṅkah</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H" cause="lexical">leṅkah</rdg></app> ti jalan, kiih ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">təlu</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">tilu</rdg><rdg wit="#H">tujuh</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">ləṅkah</lem><rdg wit="#B">lekah</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">leṅkah</rdg></app> ti jalan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">boa</lem><rdg wit="#B">boA ta</rdg></app> mo nəmu picarekən sakalih, ja
570 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">uraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ñaho
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">di</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">di na</rdg></app> ulah pamali,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">ka, ulah</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kaulah</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ka pamali</rdg><note>For another occurrence of the abbreviation <foreign>ka</foreign>, see 3.1.</note></app> ma duka, pamali ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paeh</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">pati<!-- sinonim --></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_07.02">dəṅ jəṅjəəṅ gagavar,
575 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pucuk</lem><rdg wit="#B">pucu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tambaluṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">tabaluṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">tambalaṅ</rdg></app>, sugan tampyan daləm,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kadaṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">laraṅ</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">laraṅan</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/></app>, bale laraṅan, makaṅuni ṅalaṅ sinaṅ, mapag ṅalivat ratu
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">macaṅkrama</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">macaṁkarma<!-- silent emendation by A+S --></rdg></app><!-- emendasi macaṅkrama?-->, kena itu
580 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">paranti</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">parati</rdg></app> dosa, jaga raṅ asup daləm<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> maka rea
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">liək</lem><rdg wit="#A">lyək</rdg></app>, sugan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ṅarumpak</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅarupak</rdg></app>, nəbuk, nəmbuṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A">məgatan</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H" cause="morphological">məgat</rdg></app> jajaran.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_07.03">jaga
585 <app><lem wit="#A #B">raṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">uraṅ</rdg></app> dəuk ulah salah harəp, maka
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B">rapesna</rdg></app> disila, dəṅ sugan uraṅ dibaan lemek ku tohaan,
. <app><lem wit="#B">tinəṅkən na</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H" cause="morphological">tinəṅkən</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">picarekən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">picarek</rdg><rdg wit="#H">picarekən</rdg></app> uraṅ, asiṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">siəp</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">səəp</rdg></app>
590 <app><lem type="emn">maka suka na</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">maka suka ka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ma samapun tihap suka na</rdg></app> tohaan, dəṅ maka ilik-ilik <pb edRef="#A" n="11v"/> di na turutanən, mantri, gusti,
. <app><lem wit="#B">kasasa</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H" cause="morphological">kaasa-asa</rdg></app>, bayaṅkara, nu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">marək</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">maR̥k· giraṁ</rdg></app>, paṅalasan, juru lukis,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pande daṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pande</lem><rdg wit="#B">pade</rdg></app> mas, pande gəlaṅ,
595 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pande</lem><rdg wit="#B">pade</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">vəsi</lem><rdg wit="#A">vṣa</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">juru vidaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">guru vdi</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">guru vida<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">vidu</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">mədu</rdg></app>, vayaṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kumbaṅ, gəndiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kubaṅ gədiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">kupaṅ gədiṅ</rdg></app>,
600 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tapukan</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">tatapukan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">bañolan</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">bañol</rdg></app>, pahuma, pañadap, pañavah, pañapu, belamati,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">juru moha</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>ru moha</rdg></app>, barat katiga, pajurit,
. <app><lem wit="#H">pañumpit</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pañupit</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, pamanah,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">pamraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">pam<supplied reason="omitted">a</supplied>raṅ</rdg></app>, paṅuraṅ dasa calagara, rare aṅon, paceleṅan, pakotokan, palika, prətələm, siṅ savatək guna, aya ma nu satiya di guna
605 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">di</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">di na</rdg></app> kahulunan, eta keh na
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">turutanən, kena</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip">turutanən·, <span type="omissionStart"/></rdg></app> eta ṅavakan tapa di nagara.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="8" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Role Models</head>
610 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.01">aya ma na uraṅ nu kasəsəl ku tohaan, eta keh
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">ulah diturut tvahna, bisi</lem><rdg wit="#A">ulah diturutvahna, bisi</rdg></app> uraṅ kasəsəl dəi, ini babandiṅna, upama janma
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">ləmpaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">lə<supplied reason="omitted">m</supplied>paṅ</rdg></app> ṅala<pb edRef="#A" n="12r"/>san, niñcak cucuk, tiñcak keh dəi ku uraṅ, sarua
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">sakitanana</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">sakitna</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">sakitanna</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app>, ña mana aya ma na uraṅ nu kapuji, si caṅciṅan, si laṅsitan,
. <app><lem type="norm">paka pradana</lem><rdg wit="#A">paka prədana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">maka prədana</rdg><rdg wit="#H">paka pridana</rdg></app>, emet imət rajən ləkən, satya di guna tohaan, eta
615 <app><lem wit="#A #H">ma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">mah</rdg></app> turut tvahna dəṅ gunana, boa
. <app><lem wit="#A">tu</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> uraṅ kapuji dəi.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.02">aya ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">na janma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><del>na</del> janma</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> rampes ruana, rampes
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">tiṅkahna</lem><rdg wit="#A">tikahna</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, rampes
620 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tvahna, turut saagəṅna</lem><rdg wit="#B"><span type="omissionEnd"/> sakagəIṁna</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, kena itu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">sinaṅgah</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> janma utama ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.03"><app><lem wit="#A #B #H">aya ma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><span type="omissionStart"/></rdg></app> janma rampes ruana, goreṅ tvahna, irəg
. <app><lem wit="#H #EdASD">tiṅkahna</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">tikaḥna</rdg></app>, itu dara jəəṅ rvana, ulah
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">diturut tvahna</lem><rdg wit="#A">dəṁ turutvaḥna</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><span type="omissionEnd"/></rdg><note>This whole sentence is omitted in ASD.</note></app><!-- Should the missing of reduplication is normalised silently? --><!-- from aya ma line 298-300 tvahna omitted in AD-->.</p>
625<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.04">aya ma janma goreṅ rvana, irəg
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">tiṅkahna</lem><rdg wit="#A">tikaḥna</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, rampes tvahna, itu
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">ma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">mah</rdg></app> mulah
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">diturut tiṅkahna</lem><rdg wit="#A">diturutiṁkaḥna</rdg></app>, dara sok jəəṅ rvana, turut ma tvahna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.05">aya ma janma goreṅ rvana, irə<pb edRef="#A" n="12v"/>g
630 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">tiṅkahna</lem><rdg wit="#A">tikaḥna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tikana</rdg></app>, goreṅ tvahna, itu ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">caruniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">carutniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">caruni</rdg></app> bumi, silih diri na uraṅ sabuvana,
. <app><lem wit="#H">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ṅarana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ṅaran</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">calaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">calaṁniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">calani</rdg></app> janma.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.06">itu keh na iṅətkənən, hala, hayu, goreṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rampes<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ala
635 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">guru</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">pagurvan</rdg></app>, ini
. <app><lem wit="#H">paṅiṅətna</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṁṅətna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṅiṅət<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">peṅətna</rdg></app>, aya ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">janma</lem><rdg wit="#B">na jama</rdg><rdg wit="#H">jalma</rdg></app> paeh maliṅ, paeh
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">papañjiṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B">papajiṁṅan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paeh ṅabegal</lem><rdg wit="#B">paEḥ ṅapu paEḥ ṅabegal·</rdg></app>, paeh meor, siṅ savatək cəkap carut,
640 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">eta jəəṅ</lem><rdg cause="syntactic" wit="#B #H">Eta keḥ jəqəṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kena ulah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/>laḥ</rdg></app> diturutan, ya eta kaṅkən guru nista ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.07">aya
. <app><lem wit="#B">dəi</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">ta dəI</rdg><note>Since <foreign>aya dəi</foreign> occurs without <foreign>ta</foreign> in <ptr target="#siksaKandangKaresian_21.02"/><!-- 21.2--> and <ptr target="#siksaKandangKaresian_21.03"/><!--21.3-->, I adopt the same structure here from <ptr target="#B"/>.</note></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamu</rdg></app> uraṅ ñəəṅ nu
645 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅavayaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅaduṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ṅondaṅ ṅavayaṅ</rdg></app>, ṅadeṅekən nu
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">mantun</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">matun</rdg></app>, nəmu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">siksaan</lem><rdg wit="#B">sik·<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>n·</rdg></app> ti na carita, ya kaṅkən guru paṅguṅ ṅaranna, lamun uraṅ nəmu siksaan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B">ram:pes· ma</rdg></app> ti nu
. <app><lem wit="#A">maca ma</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H">maca</rdg></app>, ya kaṅkən guru taṅtu ṅaranna, lamun mirəṅəh bənaṅ dikuryak ma, ukir-ukiran,
650 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paparahatan</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">papahətan·</rdg></app><pb edRef="#A" n="13r"/>, papaduṅan, tutulisan, sui naña ka nu
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">dikuryak</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD" cause="lexical">diguna</rdg></app><!-- use of synonim -->, təmu ku rasa soraṅan, ku bənaṅna ilik di guna sakalih, ya kaṅkən guru
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">vrəti</lem><rdg wit="#A">vrəri</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vəR̥ti</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_08.08">nəmu agama ti anak, ya kaṅkən guru rare ṅaranna, nəmu darma ti aki
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ma</lem><rdg wit="#B">ma ṅa<add place="below">na</add>na</rdg></app>, ya kaṅkən guru kaki ṅaranna, nəmu darma ti lañcək ma, ya kaṅkən guru
655 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">kakaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaṁkaṁ</rdg></app> ṅaranna, nəmu darma ti toa ma, ya kaṅkən guru uva ṅaranna, nəmu darma ti gəsan
. <app><lem type="norm">luməmpaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">luməpaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">ləmpaṅ</rdg></app>, di
. <app><lem wit="#A">lambur</lem><rdg wit="#B">labur</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ləmbur</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> di
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">gəsan</lem><rdg wit="#B">gəsa</rdg></app> ṅavəṅi, di gəsan ərən, di gəsan majik
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ya kaṅkən guru havan ṅaranna, nəmu darma
660 <app><lem type="norm">ti induṅ-bapa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ti Iduṁ bapa</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">ti induṅ ti bapa</rdg></app>, ya
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kaṁkən</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> guru kamulan ṅaranna, makaṅuni lamun hatur
. <app><lem wit="#B">ti</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">ka</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mahapandita</lem><rdg wit="#B">mahapadita</rdg><rdg wit="#H">parapandita</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere">ya kaṅkən guru <app><lem wit="#B">kautamaan</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">Utama</rdg></app>,
665 ya kaṅkən guru <app><lem wit="#B #H">kamulyan</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">mulya</rdg></app>,
. ya kaṅkən guru <app><lem wit="#B #H">kaprəmanaan</lem><rdg wit="#A">primana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">prəmana</rdg></app>,
. ya kaṅkən guru kaupadesaan</lem><witDetail wit="#A" type="retained"/><note type="altLem">ya kaṅkən guru utama ... ya kaṅkən guru kaupadesaan</note><rdg wit="#B">ya guru kamulyin· ṅarana guru kaprəmanaAn·, ya kaṁkən· guru kaUtamaAn·</rdg><note>It seems that <ptr target="#B"/> favors forms with circumfix <foreign>ka-...-an</foreign> and arranges the elements in a different sequence, while omitting an element corresponding to <foreign>kaupadesaan</foreign> in <ptr target="#A"/>.</note></app>,
. <app><lem>ya ta sinaṅguh catur-utama ṅaranna, ña mana kitu</lem><note type="altLem">ya ta ... ña mana kitu</note><rdg wit="#A">ya ta sinaṁguḥ catur Utama <del>ṅa</del>ṅarana, <g type="ddandaCross"/>, ña mana kitu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ya sinaṁguḥ catur Utama ṅarana <g type="circleCurve"/>, ña mana kitu</rdg><note>I have ignored the chapter-level punctuation found between these sentences in both mss. <!-- the relevant section of Introduction--></note></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. lamun
670 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">agəs</rdg></app> di<app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H" rend="hyphenleft">karmaniṅ akarma</lem><rdg wit="#B">-karniṁ karma</rdg></app>, di<app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenleft">tvahniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">-tvah riṅ</rdg></app> atvah,
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A">agəs</rdg></app> pahi kailikan, nu gopel nu rampes,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">nu hala</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>la</rdg></app> nu hayu.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="9" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_09">
675 <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Praise and Insult</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_09.01">kitu lamun aya nu muji uraṅ,
. <app><lem type="emn">sui ta suka gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sui ta suke gəi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sakagəi</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">sui ta, maka gəiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">sui ta sakagəi</rdg></app> uraṅ, gumanti pulaṅkən ka nu muji,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pakən</lem><rdg wit="#B">pak·kə</rdg></app> uraṅ mo
. <app><lem wit="#B">kapətəṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A #H" cause="lexical">kapətiṅan</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">kapəntiṅan</rdg></app> ku pamuji
680 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">sakalih</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>liḥ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamu</rdg></app> uraṅ daek dipuji ma, kady aṅganiṅ galah dava
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">sinambuṅan</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#A #H">tinambhuṁṅan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tinabuṁṅan</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">tinambuṅan</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><note>I follow the <ptr target="#EdASD"/> emendation, which is supported by the parallel expression <foreign>galah dava sinambugalahṅan tuna</foreign> in AG 7v.
.</note></app> tuna, rasa atoh
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ku na pamuji</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">ku pamuji</rdg></app>,
685 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">agəs</rdg></app> ma dipake haṅkara, ja ṅarasa maneh aya di imah
. <app><lem wit="#A">di</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> maneh, ku hakan, ku inum, ku suka,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ku boga</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">boga</rdg></app>, ku pakaraṅ, teka dipake
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">aṅgəhan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">Aṁgəḥhən·</rdg></app>, eta kaṅkən galah dava ta, eta kaṅkən pare hapa ta ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_09.02"><pb edRef="#A" n="14r"/>kitu lamun aya nu meda uraṅ, aku sapameda sakalih, ña mana kady aṅganiṅ galah
690 <app><lem type="norm">cəndək</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">cədək</rdg></app> tinugəlan təka, upamana uraṅ kudil, eta kaṅkən cai pamandyan, upamana uraṅ kurit, kaṅkən dataṅ nu ṅamiñakan, upamana uraṅ poño, kaṅkən dataṅ nu mere kejo,
. <app><lem type="emn">upamana</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">Upama</rdg></app> uraṅ ha<pb edRef="#B" n="5v"/>naaṅ, kaṅkən
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">dataṅ nu</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><supplied reason="omitted">dataṅ nu</supplied></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">mavakən</lem><rdg wit="#B">mavakən Uraṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">arocən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">arotən</rdg></app>,
695 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD">upamana</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">upama</rdg></app> uraṅ
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">handəəl</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">hadəqəl</rdg></app>, kaṅkən
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">dataṅ</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> nu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mere</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">mava</rdg></app> səpahən, <!-- Ms.B mengandung episode yang berbeda, meloncat ke uraian tentang makhluk mengerikan, bagian ini meloncat ke naskah B 16r.1. -->
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ya</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ya ta</rdg></app> sinaṅguh
700 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pañca</lem><rdg wit="#B">paca</rdg></app> parisuda ṅaranna, eta kaṅkən galah
. <app><lem type="norm">cəndək</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H #EdASD">cədək</rdg></app> tinugəlan
. <app><lem wit="#B">tika</lem><rdg wit="#A">ta</rdg><rdg wit="#H">tiga</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_09.03">lamun makasuka
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rasa</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ti nusa</rdg></app> uraṅ, kaṅkən pare bərat
705 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">saṅga</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">saṅga ta</rdg></app>, boa maka hurip na uraṅ reya, ja katəmu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">vuIt·</rdg></app> suka
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">lavan</lem><rdg wit="#A">luvan</rdg></app> enak,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">saṅkilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">salaṅ</rdg></app> nu ṅupat
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">uraṅ salah</lem><rdg wit="#A">uraṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ala pañaraman, aya tvah <pb edRef="#A" n="14v"/>uraṅ ma ərənan, hantə tvah uraṅ
710 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ma uṅaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">ala</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">ambu bapa paṅguruan</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">Ambu bapa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">A<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="5"/>guruAn·</rdg><note>The emendation is based on the part that is still legible in the manuscript <ptr target="#B"/>. Cf. SKK 7.1 and SMG 2.2 which contain the three members of the string, or its variant <foreign>induṅ bapa paṅguruan</foreign> at SMG 5.3, 11.2.</note></app>, kaliṅane
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">janma</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">jamna</rdg></app> ṅaranna, ya sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">paramarta</lem><rdg wit="#A">paramarrata</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paramarR̥ta</rdg></app> visesa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅa</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅarana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ya kaṅkən deva maṅjanma ṅaranna,
715 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ña</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ya</rdg></app> saṅpurnasarira,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ña vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ya vvat na</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ya vvitniṅ</rdg></app> hayu,
. <app><lem type="emn">ña</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">ya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pu<pb edRef="#B" n="17r"/>huniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg></app> bənər.</p>
. </div>
720<div type="chapter" n="10" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_10">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Complementary Practices</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_10.01">ini paṅimbuhniṅ tvah, pakən
. <app><lem wit="#A">mo tivas sakala</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">mo tivas kala</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">vas·tu sakala</rdg><note>The <ptr target="#B"/> reading also gives a plausible sense.</note></app> maṅhurip, pakən vastu di imah di maneh, emet imət<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rajən ləkən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> paka
. <app><lem type="norm">pradana</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD">prədana</rdg><rdg wit="#H">pridana</rdg></app>,
725 <app><lem wit="#B">mo rogol-rogol</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">morogol, ragol</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">morogol-rogol</rdg></app>, purusa
. <app><lem type="emn">riṅ savidagda</lem><rdg wit="#A">riṅ sa, vi<add place="below">da</add>gada</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip">vidadag</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">niṅ sa, vidagda</rdg><rdg wit="#H">purusa vidadag</rdg></app>, hapitan karavaleya, caṅciṅan, laṅsitan.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_10.02">jaga raṅ ṅajadikən gaga savah, tihap ulah saṅsara, jaga raṅ ñiən
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">kəboan</lem><rdg wit="#H">kəbon</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">kebon</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> tihap
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mulah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">ulah</rdg></app>
730 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">ṅundər</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ṅudər</rdg></app> ka huma beet sakalih, ka huma ləga sakalih,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">hamo</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">mo</rdg></app> ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">bənaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">bəna</rdg></app> uraṅ laku
. <app><lem wit="#H">sadu bema menta</lem><rdg wit="#A">sadu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sadu bema meta</rdg><note>These phrases are repeated from 4.14.</note></app>, cocooan ulah tihap
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">məli mulah tihap nukər</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">Ulaḥ məli nukər</rdg></app>, pakaraṅ
735 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ulah tihap</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="transposition">tihap ulah</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ṅiñjəm</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅijəm</rdg></app>, <pb edRef="#A" n="14r"/>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">simbut</lem><rdg wit="#B">sibut</rdg></app> cavət
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mulah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">tihap· Ulaḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">kasaratan</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">kasarataAn·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sarata</rdg><rdg wit="#H">sarata-sarata</rdg></app>, hakan inum ulah <pb edRef="#B" n="17v"/> kakuraṅan, anak eve pituturan, sugan
740 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">dipajar</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">kəna ku na</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">durbala siksa</lem><rdg wit="#B">gurubalasisa</rdg><rdg wit="#H">guru lalasisa</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_10.03"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">yatnakən</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">Iyanakən</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ siksa kandaṅ karəsian, jaga raṅ hees
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">tamba</lem><rdg wit="#B">taba</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">tunduh</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">tuduh</rdg></app>, ṅinum
745 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD">tvak</lem><rdg wit="#A">tvaḥk</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tamba</lem><rdg wit="#B">taba</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> hanaaṅ, ñatu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">tamba</lem><rdg wit="#B">taba</rdg></app> poño, ulah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">uraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">kajoṅjoṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kajojoṅan</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kajojoṅan· təIṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ṅajojoṅan təiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">kajoṅjonan</rdg></app>,
750 <app><lem wit="#A">tinəṅkən mariṅ na</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">tinəṁkən· basa na</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">yatnakən mariṅ ku</rdg></app> hantə, saṅuni tu ku anak
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">ku</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> eve, mulah dek kapalikətan, sugan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">hamo</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">mo</rdg></app> sapitvahən, rampes ma bənaṅ uraṅ ñaraman, teka nurut na pañaraman, eta keh anak uraṅ, <!-- ms B mengandung episode berbeda--> eve uraṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ṅa</rdg></app>, <!-- msB 6v paralel kembali -->hantə ma nurut ka pamagahan, eta sarua dəṅən sakalih, ṅan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamu</rdg></app> kədə, eve anak gəs ma
755 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mədəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kədə</rdg></app> diaku ku uraṅ, boa uraṅ kabobotan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">boa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> rəjəṅ sasab ka naraka, ləṅit batri
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">raṅ ṅabakta</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">Uraṁ <add place="below">he</add>se</rdg></app>, hilaṅ bənaṅ <pb edRef="#A" n="15v"/> cakal bagal.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="11" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11">
760 <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Instruction of Darma Pitutur</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.01">ini
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">varah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">paṁvaraḥ</rdg></app> saṅ darma pitutur, sugan
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">uraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ura</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">pahədap</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="orthographical">pahidəp</rdg></app>.</p>
765
.
. <lg xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.02" met="free_octosyllabic" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><l n="1"><app><lem type="emn">sriopeksah</lem><rdg wit="#A">mrəOpekṣaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">mrəOpek·sa</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">samutatah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">saṁmutataḥ</rdg></app></l>
. <l n="2">paesanteh tan susuriyəm</l>
770 <l n="3"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">jambaṅan əsiniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>ṅaL̥səniṁ</rdg></app> bañu
. <app><lem wit="#A">mahəniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">mahana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ma həniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">mahmiy</rdg></app></l>
. <l n="4">tah desana tah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">nora buksah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">nobusaḥ</rdg></app></l></lg> <!-- foreign or quote? OJ -->
.
775 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.03"><app><lem wit="#A">kaliṅanna ta</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">kaliṅanya</rdg></app>, sri ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ṅarana</rdg></app> omas, kitu na omas,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">lamun</rdg></app> hamo
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">dilañja</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">dilaja</rdg></app>, pələk rupana,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">lamun</rdg></app>
780 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kalañja</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kalaja</rdg></app> ma, cenaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">rupana</rdg><!-- memilih bacaan B --></app> ja
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kaopeksa</lem><rdg wit="#B">kaOpesa</rdg></app>, kitu keh upama uraṅ janma ini, lamun nurut saṅ hyaṅ siksa, kapahayu rasana di uraṅ, kady aṅganiṅ bənər tuməmu bənərnya, kitu lamun hamo nurut saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">siksa krəta</lem><rdg wit="#B">sisa krata</rdg></app>, kady aṅganiṅ vilut tuməmu vilutnya.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.04"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">paesan ma</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">paEsan· ta ma</rdg></app> ṅaranya
785 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">əntəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">qətəṁ</rdg></app>, kitu na
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">əntəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">qətəṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">lamun</rdg></app> hamo
. <app><lem wit="#B">divaas</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H" cause="morphological">kavaas</rdg></app>, samar kalaṅkaṅ uraṅ, lamunna kavaas ma puguh
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rua</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">kalaṅkaṁ</rdg></app> <pb edRef="#A" n="16r"/> uraṅ, dina jəro
790 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">əntəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">qətəṁ</rdg></app> eta, kitu keh
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">uraṅ janma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">janma</rdg></app> ini, bisa nurut upacara sakalih rampes ma, boa kalihasan ku rasa di maneh, lamun hamo ma bisa nurut pamagahan, puṅguṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">tata</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.05">jambaṅan ma ṅaranya pamuruyan, kaṅkən cai həniṅ ma hədap uraṅ krəta,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ña kitu</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H">ña mana kitu</rdg></app> manana vaas,
795 <app><lem wit="#A">təhər rame</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">heraṁ rampes</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">təgər rame</rdg><note><!--Mungkin dengan adanya rame ambək penulis naskah B confuse.--></note></app>
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Abək</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.06">desa ma ṅaranya dayəh, na dayəh lamunna kosoṅ hantə turutanənana, kitu na sabda<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> lamunna hamo kaəsi, carut ṅaranna, heṅan lamunna
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kaəsyan</lem><rdg wit="#B">kaqəsyi</rdg></app> ma na kahanan, eta keh na turutanən, kitu keh na sabda<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">maka</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">mana</rdg></app> kaəsyan, mana dipajar bənər laksana.</p>
800<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.07">kitu keh uraṅ janma ini, lamun dek ñaho di puhun suka lavan enak ma, iṅətkən sahur <pb edRef="#A" n="16v"/> saṅ darma pitutur, ini silokana,</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.08" met="free_octosyllabic" xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="1"><app><lem wit="#B">tataka</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">tatakaṁ</rdg></app> carita haṅsa,</l>
. <l n="2">gajendra carita banəm,</l>
805 <l n="3"><app><lem wit="#EdASD">matsyanəm</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">macanəm</rdg></app> carita sagarəm,</l>
. <l n="4"><app><lem>puspanəm carita baṅbarəm.</lem><note type="altLem">tatakaṅ...baṅbarəm</note><note>While the first hemistich is fully octosyllabic, the second has nine syllables in both lines. This could easily be remedied by conjecturing unsuffixed forms <foreign>matsya</foreign> and <foreign>puspa</foreign> just as we have <foreign>tataka</foreign> and <foreign>gajendra</foreign> in the first hemistich.</note></app></l>
. </lg>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.09">kaliṅanya kitu
810 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">jaga raṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ja uraṅ</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">ja raṅ</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> dek cəta, ulah salah gəsan naña, lamun hayaṅ ñaho di
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">talaga heraṅ bañu atis</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">taman heraṅ, talaga bañu atis</rdg></app> ma, haṅsa taña, kaliṅanna ma<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> aya ma janma, atisti riṅ apraniti, heraṅ tinəṅ, rame ambək,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">ña keh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ñoṅkah</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">ñokah</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> kaṅkən haṅsa di na talaga heraṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.10">hayaṅ ñaho di jəroniṅ laut ma,
815 <app><lem wit="#EdASD">matsya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">maca</rdg></app> taña, kaliṅanna ma<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">upama</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">upamana</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">janma</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">hayaṅ</rdg></app> ñaho di hədap saṅ deva ratu, dəṅ di hədap mahapandita.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.11">hayaṅ ñaho di lvarniṅ ləvəṅ ma, gajah taña, ini kaliṅanna, kaṅkən
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">ləvəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> lvar ta ma, ñaho di
820 <app><lem wit="#A">tinəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">hidə</rdg><rdg wit="#H">hidəp</rdg></app> nu reya, kaṅkən
. <app><lem wit="#A">gajah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">liman<!-- note synonim--></rdg></app> ta ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ña keh</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ñaho</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> bəbədas saṅ <pb edRef="#A" n="17r"/> deva ratu.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.12">hayaṅ ñaho di ruum amisniṅ kəmbaṅ ma,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">baṅbara</lem><rdg wit="#A">baṁba<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/><unclear>bar</unclear>ra</rdg></app> taña, kaliṅanna ta<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> kaṅkən
825 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">baṅbara</lem><rdg wit="#A">babara</rdg></app> ma janma bisa, saba
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ṅumbara</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅubara</rdg></app> ñaho di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">tiṅkah</lem><rdg wit="#A">tikaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tinə</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">sakalih</lem><rdg wit="#A">saliḥ</rdg></app>, kaṅkən ruum kəmbaṅ ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">na janma rampes tvahna</lem><rdg wit="#B">jan· rapes· tvaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">jalma ta ma ṅan rampes toh</rdg></app>,
830 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">amis</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">Asiḥ</rdg></app> baruṅusan, səmu
. <app><lem wit="#A">imuc</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">guyu<!-- note synonim --></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">imut</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">tiṅkah</lem><rdg wit="#A">tikaḥ</rdg></app> suka.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.13">kaliṅanna ulah salah gəsan naña, hayaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">dek</lem><rdg wit="#B #EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ñaho di sakvehniṅ carita ma, gəs
835 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">darma jati</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">damar jati</rdg></app>, saṅ hyaṅ hayu, jayasena, sedamana,
. <app><lem type="emn">kuñjarakarna</lem><rdg wit="#A">pujayakarna</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">kuñjayakarna</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">pu jayakarma</rdg></app>, ramayana, adiparva,
. <app><lem wit="#B">koravasrama</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">koravasarma</rdg></app>, bima sorga, raṅga lave, boma, sumana, kalapurbaka, jarini,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tantri</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">taṁtri</rdg></app>, siṅ savatək carita ma, memen taña.</p>
840<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.14"><app><lem wit="#A #B #H">dek</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD" cause="eye-skip">hayaṅ</rdg></app> ñaho di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">sakvehniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakvaḥniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>oEḥniṁ</rdg></app> kavih ma, kavih
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">bvat tuha</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">bvatuha</rdg><rdg wit="#H">voṅ toha</rdg></app>, kavih
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">pañjaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">pujaṁ</rdg></app>, kavih lalaṅuan, kavih pañaraman, kavih
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">sisindiran</lem><rdg wit="#A">sisidiran</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sisidirran</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> kavih
845 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">peṅpe<pb edRef="#A" n="17v"/>ledan</lem><rdg wit="#A">peṅpeṅledan</rdg></app>, boṅboṅ kaso,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">pore rane</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">pərerane</rdg></app>, porod
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">ərih</lem><rdg wit="#A">qəri</rdg></app>, kavih babahanan, kavih
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">babaroṅan</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">baṅbaroṅan</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/></app>, kavih taṅtuṅ, kavih
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">sasambatan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sasabatan</rdg></app>, kavih igəl-igəlan, siṅ savatək kavih ma, paraguna taña.</p>
850<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.15">hayaṅ ñaho di
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">para macəh</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">pamacəh</rdg></app> ma, cəta macəh, cəta
. <app><lem type="emn">mirus</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">nirus·</rdg></app>, tatapukan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">babaroṅan</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">baṅbaroṅan</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/></app>, babakutrakan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">abaṅ-abaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, nərəy
855 <app><lem type="emn">pañcaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">pañca</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paca</rdg></app>, munikən
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">ləbur</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ləmbur</rdg></app>, ṅadu ləsuṅ, asup ka na lantar, ṅadu nini, siṅ savatək
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kaulinan</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Ulinan·</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ulinan</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">həmpul</lem><rdg wit="#B">həpul</rdg></app> taña.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.16">hayaṅ ñaho di pantun ma, laṅga laraṅ, bañak catra, sili vaṅi, hatur vaṅi, prəpantun taña.</p>
860<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.17"><app><lem wit="#EdASD">salvirniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">savalviran:iṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">savalurran·niṁ</rdg></app> tulis ma,
. <app><lem type="norm">pupuñjəṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">pupuñjəṁṅa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pupu<add place="below">jə</add>ṁṅan</rdg><rdg wit="#H">pupujiṅan</rdg></app>, hihiṅgulan, kəkəmbaṅan, alas-alasan, uraṅ-uraṅan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #B">məmətahan</lem><rdg wit="#H">mimilahan</rdg></app>, sisiraṅan, ta<pb edRef="#A" n="18r"/>ruk hata, kəmbaṅ tarate, siṅ savatək tulis ma, lukis taña.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.18"><app><lem wit="#EdASD">salvirniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A"><unclear>sava</unclear>lviraniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">savalurran·niṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">tətəpaan</lem><rdg wit="#A"><unclear>t</unclear>ə<unclear>t</unclear>əpaAn·</rdg></app> ma, təlu gaṅgaman,
865 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">palainna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">palain</rdg></app>, gaṅgaman di saṅ prabu ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">pədaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, abət, pamuk, golok, peso
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">təndət</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">tədət</rdg></app>, kəris,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">raksasa</lem><rdg wit="#B">rak·rak·sa</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>devanya, ja itu
870 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paranti</lem><rdg wit="#B">parati</rdg></app> maehan sagala, gaṅgaman
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> voṅ tani ma, kujaṅ, baliuṅ, patik, kored, sadap, detya
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pinaḥka-</rdg><rdg wit="#H">pindah ka</rdg></app>devanya, ja
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">itu</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">paranti</lem><rdg wit="#B">parati</rdg></app> ṅala kikicapən, iinumən<!-- note reduplication for plural -->, gaṅgaman saṅ pandita ma,
875 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kalakatri</lem><rdg wit="#B">kalakatra</rdg><rdg wit="#H">kalikatra</rdg></app>, peso raut, peso doṅdaṅ, paṅot, pakisi, danava
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>devanya, ja itu paranti
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kumərət</lem><rdg wit="#B">kuməR̥</rdg></app> sagala, ña mana
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">təlu na gaṅgaman</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">tilu gagaman·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">palainna</lem><rdg wit="#B">palaIna, mana laI</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">palain</rdg><rdg wit="#H">palainna, mana lain</rdg></app> dəi, di saṅ prəbu, di saṅ voṅ tani, di saṅ pandita, kitu lamun <pb edRef="#A" n="18v"/> uraṅ hayaṅ ñaho di
880 <app><lem wit="#A #H">sareyana</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/>na</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">sareanana</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">sarean</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app> eta ma,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">panday</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">paday</rdg></app> taña.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app><note><!-- corresp="#TJn_24" -->TJñ 24: <foreign>ikaṅ khaḍga makveh lvirnya, ana khaḍga pinakagaman-gaman saṅ prabhu, ana khaḍga pinakagaman-gaman iṅ voṅ tani, ana khaḍga pinakagaman-gaman saṅ paṇḍita, ya yatah khaḍga juga kasaṅjñānya kabeh, yāvat vusi malaṇḍəp, tāvat khaḍga juga kasaṅjñanya, tuhun gavenya juga dudū, ikaṅ khaḍga haneṅ saṅ prabhu, kady aṅganiṅ curik, malalya śaṅkuh, pinakasādhananiṅ apraṅ maṅalap huripaknanya, ikaṅ khaḍga hana riṅ voṅ tani, kady aṅganiṅ luke, prəkul, pinakasādhananiṅ amijilakĕn karmmopajīva paknanya, ikaṅ khaḍga hana riṅ saṅ paṇḍita, kady aṅganiṅ pakisi, kartrī, karayu, pinakasādhananiṅ amiso, paṅri paknanya</foreign>.</note></app>
. </listApp>
885 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.19"><app><lem wit="#EdASD">salvirniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">savalviran:iṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">savalurran·niṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">savaliraniṅ</rdg></app> ukir ma, dinanagakən, dibaroṅkən, ditiru paksi, ditiru

.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_11.22">lamun hayaṅ ñaho

. <app><lem wit="#A">bubu</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">babu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">bubuḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">barə</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ñiri</lem><rdg wit="#B">ñiriṁ</rdg></app>,
1005 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">sapari</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, patukaṅan, surabaya,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">lampuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamaruṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">jambudipa</lem><rdg wit="#B">jabudipa</rdg></app>, seran,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">gədah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, solot,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">solodoṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
1010 <app><lem type="norm">indragiri</lem><rdg wit="#B">Idragiri</rdg><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">bali, Indragiri</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">tañjuṅpura</lem><rdg wit="#B">tujuṁpura</rdg></app>, sakampuṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">atas aṅin</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">cəmpa</lem><rdg wit="#B">cəmara</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">baluk</lem><rdg wit="#B">baluga</rdg></app>, java, siṅ savatək para nusa ma, saṅ
1015 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">juru basa darma-murcaya</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">juru basa taña, saṁ darmurcaya</rdg></app> taña.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="12" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12">
.<head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">The Thread of the Gods</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.01">eta keh na kañahokənən, di tuhuna di yogyana, aya ma nu
1020 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">majar</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">majar maneḥ</rdg></app> mo
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">ñaho</lem><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">ñao</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/></app>, eta nu mo satya di guna di maneh,
. <app><lem type="emn">moha</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD">mo</rdg><rdg wit="#H">hamo</rdg></app> təiṅ di carek devata uraṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">mo takut di upadrava, jagat-ganti cadu-sakti saṅ pandita</lem><rdg wit="#B">mo taku di Upadrava, cadusak·ti, jagat· gan·ti saṁ pan·dita</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, tan avuruṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">inanti deniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">Inaṁti deneṁ</rdg></app> kavah.</p>
1025<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.02"><app><lem wit="#A #H">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/>na</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">lamun</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">guna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> mo dipiguna,
. <app><lem wit="#A">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#B">lamu</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> tvah mo
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">dipitvah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">tvaḥ</rdg></app>, sahiṅaniṅ guna krəta, kena itu taṅtu hyaṅ taṅtu devata,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">sakakala</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">sakala</rdg></app> batara jagat, basa ṅrətakən bumi niskala, basana brahma, visnu, isora, mahadeva, siva<pb edRef="#A" n="22r"/>h, bakti ka batara, basana
1030 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">indra</lem><rdg wit="#B">Idra</rdg></app>, yama, baruna, kovera, besavarna, bakti ka batara, basana kusika, garga, mestri, purusa,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">patañjala</lem><rdg wit="#B">patajala</rdg></app>, bakti ka batara, siṅ para devata kabeh,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">pada</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> bakti ka batara seda niskala, pahi maṅgihkən si tuhu, lavan
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">pratyaksa</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">prətyaksa</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.03">ini na
1035 <app><lem wit="#A #H">paṅgihkənən</lem><rdg wit="#B">pagiḥkən:ən·</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">pamaṅgihkənən</rdg></app> di na sakala, taṅtu batara di bvana, pakən pagəh jadi manik sakuruṅan, pakənən teja sabumi, hulun bakti di tohaan, eve bakti di laki, anak bakti di bapa, sisya bakti di guru, mantri bakti di maṅkubumi, maṅkubumi bakti di ratu, ratu bakti di devata, disuruh nəguhkən di sarira<!-- note pronominal of ’self’ -->,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">matitiskən</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">matitikən·</rdg></app> bayu sabda
. <app><lem wit="#A">hədap</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">hidəp</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.04"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">lamun:a</rdg></app> itu hamo kapiguna, kapitvah ku na janma, kanista madya utama, pada diti<pb edRef="#A" n="22v"/>bakən ka na kavah si
. <app><lem type="norm">tambra-gomuka</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">tambrah gomuka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">taman·braḥmamuka</rdg></app>
1040 <app><lem wit="#B #H">vijaya, ja</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">vijaya ja</rdg></app> na janma kavisesa ku devata pun.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.05">sahur saṅ darma pitutur, mujarakən sabda saṅ rumuhun, aya dəi
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">babandiṅna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="morphological">babadiṁṅan·nana</rdg></app>, kitu upamana uraṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ləmpaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">L̥paṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ka java</lem><rdg cause="additive" wit="#B #H">ka java, dataṁ ka Alas· java</rdg></app>, hamo bisa nurut carekna, dəṅən carana, maṅu rasa uraṅ, aṅgəs ma pulaṅ dəi ka sunda, hantə bisa
1045 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">carek</lem><rdg wit="#B">care</rdg></app> java, asa
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">hantə dataṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">hatə tadaṁ</rdg></app> ñaba, poos tukuna bənaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">tadaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">paṅhulu tandaṅ</rdg></app>, ja
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">hantə</lem><rdg wit="#B">hatə</rdg></app> bisa
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">nurut</lem><rdg wit="#B">nuru</rdg></app>
1050 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">carekna</lem><rdg wit="#A">carena</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_12.06">kitu uraṅ janma ini,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">haṅər</lem><rdg wit="#H">haṅgər</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ha<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>gər</rdg><note>EdASD mistakenly indicates a missing nasal, while it is the expected consonant <foreign>g</foreign> that is not written. But I suspect that the absence of the stop in <foreign>haṅər</foreign> is not a transmissional error, but a real linguistic alternative.</note></app> turun ti niskala, hantə katəmu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">cara</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">carek·</rdg><note>See the preceding paragraph, <foreign>hamo bisa nurut carekna, dəṅən carana</foreign>.</note></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">devata,</lem><rdg wit="#B">niskala, mo devata</rdg></app> gəra-gəra dek maṅjanma, ja
1055 <app><lem wit="#A #H">kapuṅguṅan ruana</lem><rdg wit="#B">kapuguṁṅan· rvana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, irəg tiṅkahna, hantə bisa
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">nurut tvah</lem><rdg wit="#A">nurutvaḥ</rdg></app> nu ñaho, aya kapitvah
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">ta</lem><note>This reading is slightly suspicious. Should we conjecture <foreign>ku</foreign> or <foreign>ma</foreign>? Cf. <foreign>kapitvah ku na janma</foreign>, <foreign>kavisesa ku devata</foreign> in 12.4.</note></app> nu mo satya, nu tan yogya, luməkas maṅgave hala,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">papañjiṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B">papajiṁṅan</rdg></app>, bubunyan, kapiadi, kapilañcək, ña mana vadon ṅarasa lalaki, lai<pb edRef="#A" n="23r"/>n salakina, tan yogya ṅaranna, lalaki ṅarasa vadon, lain əsi imahna, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B">yoya</rdg></app> ṅaranna, vənaṅ ditibakən ka na kavah, si mrəga vijaya,
1060 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">ja na</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> janma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅavisesakən na</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="syntactic">kavisesa ku</rdg></app> salah.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="13" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13">
.<head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Four Demons</head>
1065 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.01">ini siloka tvah janma salah, buraṅkak,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">marende</lem><rdg wit="#A">marande</rdg><rdg wit="#B">marede</rdg></app>, mariris, viraṅ, ya ta catur-buta ṅaranna,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kaliṅanna</rdg></app>, buraṅkak ma ṅaranya gila, nu kaṅkən makagila ta ma, tvah janma,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">dəṅki</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">dəṅi</rdg></app>, tuṅi, toroṅ, gasoṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">campəlak</lem><rdg wit="#B">capəla</rdg><rdg wit="#H">capəlak</rdg></app> sabda, gopel tvah, panas hate, tan
1070 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B">yoya</rdg></app> ṅaranna, ña keh nu
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kaṅkən makagila</lem><rdg wit="#B">kakən· maṁkagila</rdg></app> ta, tvah janma sakitu, jadina ta
. <app><lem wit="#H">raksasa</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">raksaksa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">rak·rak·sa</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">durga durgi</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">durgi durga</rdg></app>, kalabuta, gəsanna
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B">ma</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ta ma</rdg></app> di malaniṅ ləmah.</p>
1075<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.02"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">malaniṅ ləmah ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><note>If my assumption that these words are original is correct, then their omission in <ptr target="#B"/> may be due to eyeskip.</note></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">sodoṅ, saroṅge</lem><rdg wit="#B">so<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>sekoṁ, soṁgeṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">sekoṅ soṅgeṅ</rdg></app>, cadas
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">gantuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">gatel·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">muṅkal pateṅgaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">mukal pategaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">mu<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>kal pategaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">muṅkal pateṅtoṅ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ləbak, rañcak</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">baba racak·</rdg></app>, kəbakan badak, ca<pb edRef="#A" n="23v"/>taṅ
1080 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">nuṅgaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">nugaṁ</rdg></app>, cataṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">noṅgeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">nogeṁ</rdg></app>, garuṅguṅan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">gareṅgeṅan, ləmah</lem><rdg wit="#B">gareṁgeṁ <gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="5"/></rdg><rdg wit="#H">garuṅguṅan</rdg></app> ləmah
. <app><lem wit="#B">saṅhar</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">sahar</rdg><rdg wit="#H">saṅar</rdg></app>, daṅdaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">variyan</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">va<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/>, kəpuḥ raṁR̥ḥ garamayan·</rdg><note>It is interesting that <ptr target="#B"/> add on a list three kinds of trees: <foreign>kəpuh</foreign> (<foreign> Sterculia foetida L.</foreign>), <foreign>raṅrəh</foreign> (probably equivalent with <foreign>randu</foreign>, MdS dial. <foreign>raṅru</foreign>, <foreign>Eriodendrum anfractuosum</foreign>), and <foreign>garamayan</foreign> (probably equivalent to MdS <foreign>haramay</foreign> <q>china-grass</q>, <foreign>Boehmeria nivea Gaudich</foreign>). </note></app>, huñur, ləmah laki, pitunahan celeṅ,
1085 <app><lem wit="#EdASD">kalomberan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kaloberran</rdg><rdg wit="#H">koloberan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">jaryan, səma</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="transposition">səma jaryin·</rdg><rdg wit="#H">səma jaryan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">savatək ləmah kasiṅsal</lem><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.03">sakitu
. <app><lem wit="#A">kajajadyan</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kajadian</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kajajadyanana</rdg></app> nu
1090 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kədə di tvahna</lem><rdg wit="#B">kə<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="4"/></rdg></app> gopel, ja
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">tvahniṅ janma</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">tvaḥ jama</rdg></app> nu mere gila
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, jadina ta savatək mahagila, ja hantə nurut saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">sasana</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">sisa</rdg></app> krəta, ja
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">ṅarumpak</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅarupak·</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ siksa kandaṅ karəsyan, ña mana jadi mahagila, ya ta kaliṅaniṅ buraṅkak ṅaranna.</p>
1095<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.04">marende ma ṅaranna, <app><lem type="emn">dibere</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">dibeka</rdg></app> tiis ña karah
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">panas</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">panah</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">dikahemankən</lem><rdg wit="#B">di<add place="below">be</add>kahemakən·</rdg><rdg wit="#H">dibəka hemankən</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">dihemankən</rdg></app>, dikaruñaan, diipuk,
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">dimemeh-memeh</lem><rdg wit="#B">dime<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="4"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">dineneh</rdg></app>, dibere suka boga, hulun kuriṅ, ña karah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kira-kirakənənana</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kira-kirakən·nana</rdg></app>,
1100 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">byakta kəna ku na</lem><rdg wit="#B">byaktakən· kana</rdg><rdg wit="#H">dibeakən kana</rdg></app> kapapaan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">əsi</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> təgal si
. <app><lem wit="#B">patana</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD #H">pantana</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sayojana</lem><rdg wit="#A">sayoñana</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">sayoj·ñana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">sayajñana</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">lohna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">tvaḥna</rdg></app>, ti timur ma kalapa <pb edRef="#A" n="24r"/>
1105 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">kandaga</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>daga</rdg></app><!-- should emend to khadga? -->, sakəti voṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">kəna irika</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">kəna papa irika</rdg></app>, ti kidul ma gunuṅ vatu, parəṅ sevu voṅ papa irika, ti barat
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">yaksa</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">pak·si</rdg></app> gəni-muka, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">kinavruhan voṅ kvehnya</lem><rdg wit="#B">kəna vruḥnya</rdg><rdg wit="#H">kəna vruhan reya</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">kənavruhan voṅ kvehnya</rdg></app> papa irika,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">ti kaler kadi valaṅ sinudukan, parəṅ satus voṅ papa </lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>irika, ti təṅah gagak
1110 <app><lem type="emn">si patana</lem><rdg wit="#A">si pantana</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><add place="below">sa</add>pnatana</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">si antana</rdg><rdg wit="#H">si rapatana</rdg></app><!-- note pasangan s -->,
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">lavan</lem><rdg wit="#A">luvan·</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #H">sona yaksa</lem><rdg wit="#B">sona Iyak·sa</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">senayaksa</rdg></app><!-- note pasangan s -->, sevu-sevu voṅ papa irika, ya
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">kapapaaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kapapaniṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#H">marende ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#A">marende ṅaranya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">marede ṅaranna</rdg></app>.</p>
1115 <listApp type="parallels">
. <app><note><!-- corresp="#KP_13" -->Cf. Kuñj 13–14: <foreign> seg, ləs, ḍatəṅ ta ya riṅ tgal petrabavāna, sayvajñāna lvanya, maṅaḍəg ta saṅ kuñjarakarṇṇa, ri tpi nikaṅ tgāl agnikvarava, tinambak iṅ api təpinya ri tṅah hikaṅ bumipatanā, ya ta ugvan ikaṅ kayu kalpakandagā, kayu-kayu marvan kaṇḍaga, kucupnyā taji, rinya sarvvasañjata, gəṅnya sapucaṅ, ruhurnya sapuluh ḍpa, lveniṅ ahubnya sapuluh laksa i svarnya tṛna kandagā, dukutnika taji, lavan curigga. irika taṅ vatək pāpa maṅiḍəpāñcagatĩ saṅsara, ya tikā linud sinakitan deni saṅ yamabalā. mapa ta lvirānya katvan ḍe saṅ kuñjarakarṇṇa, hana vinaduṅ kapalānya, hana sinaṅkalā, vaneh sinəbitakən śilitnya kadivaḍi, pinupuh ta yā riṅ gaḍa vsi, sivak ta kāpalanya, cumveṭot ta ya hutəknya, thər hinurun sukunya, parəṅ ta ya sākasatus pisan, paḍa marəmpu, dinuk ta ya riṅ sula vsi, gəṅnya sapucaṅ, ḍavanya sapuluh ḍpa, parəṅ sakasatus pisan. mapa ta lvirānya, kadi valaṅ sinundukan, manaṅis ta ya hāṅanaṅānaṅi. hana sambāt hiduṅ bapa, vaneh asambat ānak rabinya, hana ta pākṣi yakṣa si ṣantana ṅaranya, gāgak [em. gālak Kern] mahəlar curigā, kaṇḍaga pinakākukunya, kuku mānval bhajra, mahlar kaṇḍaga, mavaruṅ tajī. </foreign>.</note></app></listApp>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.05"><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mariris</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">muriṅis·</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, camah, jiji
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">manan</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ma ṅarana</rdg></app> tahi, camah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">manan</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ma ṅanana</rdg></app> vaṅke
1120 <app><lem wit="#A #B">abo</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ambə</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#EdASD">abə</rdg><witDetail wit="#EdASD" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#H">bo</rdg></app>, kitu keh tvah janma cacarokot, baraṅ cokot,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">aṅgəs ma</lem><rdg wit="#A">agəs ma</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> baraṅ ala hamo menta, maliṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">numpu</lem><rdg wit="#B">nupu</rdg><rdg wit="#H">mupu</rdg></app>, meor, ṅarəbut, siṅ savatək curavəda ka nu bənər, paeh ma atmana papa, sarivu saratus tahun kəna ku sapa batara,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">taṅeh</lem><rdg wit="#B">ta<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>ḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ta</rdg></app> mana jadi janma, aya jadina ta,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">koter</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">kotor</rdg></app>,
1125 <app><lem type="norm">jaṅgel</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">jagel</rdg><rdg wit="#B">jaṁṅel</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ṅaṅel</rdg></app>, hi<pb edRef="#A" n="24v"/>ləd tahun, pitək,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">titiṅgi</lem><rdg wit="#A">titigi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">jambəloṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">jabəlo</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ṅabəlo</rdg></app>, limus sakərət,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">mear<!-- not in dictionary, but in Bogor people know it as kind of leech -->, pacet, lentah</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ləhəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">lohoṅ</rdg></app>,
1130 <app><lem wit="#A">gərəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">goroṅ</rdg></app>, savatək
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">dipikajiji</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">dipake jiji</rdg><rdg wit="#H">dipikajəṅi</rdg></app> ku
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">na</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">nu</rdg></app> uraṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rea, ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg><rdg wit="#H">ya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">sinagu</rdg></app> mariris ṅaranna.</p>
1135<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_13.06">viraṅ ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">ṅaranyi</rdg></app>, mumul tuhu, mumul bənər, mumul
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">yoya</rdg></app>, mumul duga-duga, mumul bema,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">lamunna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">lamun</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">carut</lem><rdg wit="#B">carat</rdg></app> ma harən,<!-- CHECK BACAAN A DAN B -->
1140 <app><lem type="emn">harəsa</lem><rdg wit="#A">harən harəsa</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">harəmsa</rdg><rdg wit="#H">rəsa</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh, gavok</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">bogoh, gavok</rdg></app>, lamunna paeh ma eta atmana
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">maṅgihkən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ma<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>gihkən</rdg></app> papa, vot goṅgaṅ, cukaṅ cuət, batu kacakup,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">dijadikən</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">kajadikən</rdg></app> ma ka bvana, jadi vatək mahagila, varak, macan, vuhaya, ula magəṅ, savatək makagila janma, ya ta ma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">viraṅ ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip">varaṁ ṅanyi</rdg></app>, sakitu
1145 <app><lem wit="#A">na catur-buta</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">caturbuta ṅaranya</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ma caturbuta</rdg></app>.</p>
.
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="14" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14">
.<head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Three Forms of Consciousness (tri-gəiṅ)</head>
1150 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14.01">ini ma upama janma tandaṅ ka cina, həbəl maṅkuk di cina, ñaho di karma cina, di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">tiṅkah</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">tikaḥ</rdg></app> cina, di carek cina, di polah ci<pb edRef="#A" n="25r"/>na, di kararampesan cina, katəmu na carek təlu, kanista, madya, utama, pahi ñaho di sabda saṅ prabu, saṅ rama, saṅ rəsi, bisa matitiskən bayu sabda hədap, ña mana ñaho di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">gəI</rdg></app>, di
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">upagəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">upagəI</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">rupagəIṁ</rdg></app>, di
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD">parigəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">parigəI</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ya ta
1155 <app><lem wit="#EdASD">tri-gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">tri-gəI</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14.02"><app><lem wit="#EdASD">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">gəI</rdg></app> ma bisa ṅicap bisa
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">ṅinum</lem><rdg wit="#A"><unclear>ṅinum·</unclear></rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">ṅicup</rdg></app> bisa di na kasukaan, ya
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">gəI</rdg></app> ṅaranna,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">upagəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">upagəI</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Upa<add place="below">ma</add>gəI</rdg><rdg wit="#H">upama gəi</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, bisa ñandaṅ, bisa
1160 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">ṅaṅgo</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅago</rdg></app>, bisa babasahan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">bisa dibusana</lem><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">ya upagəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">UpagəI</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>pagəI</rdg></app> ṅaranna,
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">parigəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">parigəI</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, bisa nitah bisa mivaraṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ja</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
1165 <app><lem wit="#A #B">sabdana</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">sabda</rdg></app> arum
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">mavaṅi</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">vavaṅi</rdg></app>, ña mana hantə surah nu dipivaraṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ja</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> katuju
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">ku</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">nu</rdg><rdg wit="#H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">bənaṅna milabuh</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD" cause="morphological">bənaṁ milabuh</rdg><rdg wit="#H">bənaṅ kami</rdg></app> siloka.</p>
1170<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14.03">lamun ka beet ma basana, utun, eten,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">orok</lem><rdg wit="#H">denok</rdg></app>, anakiṅ, adiiṅ, ka kolot ma basana, lañcəkiṅ,
. <app><lem type="norm">suvaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">suAniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="eye-skip">sumaṁṅər</rdg><note>The scribe of <ptr target="#B"/> seems to have skipped to the word <foreign>sumaṅər</foreign> further on in the list, but then to have skipped back, so that no loss of word other than <foreign>suvaniṅ</foreign> has resulted from this eye-skip.</note></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">əcəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD">qəcuIṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#H">iñcuiṅ</rdg><note>In their translation, ASD interpret <foreign>əcuiṅ</foreign> as <foreign>əcəiṅ</foreign> ‘my sister’, which seems plausible, even though this appellation is unattested elsewhere in Old Sundanese.
.</note></app>,<!-- this word is misplaced, probably a crux -->
1175 <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">toaiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, akiiṅ, paṅvastuna ma su<pb edRef="#A" n="25v"/>maṅər,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">tətəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">tə<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>təiṅ</rdg></app> amat, sakitu na dasa-pasanta, gəs ma guna<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> nama, hook<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> pesok<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> asih<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> karuña,
. <app><lem type="emn">mukpruk</lem><rdg wit="#A">mupraruk</rdg><rdg wit="#B">mupru</rdg><rdg wit="#H">mupuru</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">mupruk</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ṅulas, ñəcəp<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ṅala aṅən, ña mana suka buṅah<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> padaṅ caaṅ nu dipivaraṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD">parigəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #H">parigəI</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14.04">
1180 ini <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">silokana</lem><rdg wit="#A">salokana</rdg></app>, mas, pirak,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">komala</lem><rdg wit="#B">kobala</rdg><rdg wit="#H">kombara</rdg></app>, hintən, ya ta
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #EdASD">saṅ hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#H">sinaṅguh</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">catur-yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B">tuhuyoya</rdg><rdg wit="#H">yogya</rdg></app> ṅaranna, ini kaliṅanna, mas ma ṅaranya, sabda tuhu, təpət byakta, pañcaksara, pirak ma ṅaranya, ambək
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">krəta yogya</lem><rdg wit="#A">krata yogya</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> rahayu,
1185 <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD #H">komala</lem><rdg wit="#A"><unclear>ko</unclear><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg></app> ma ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#B #EdASD">gəiṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A #H">gəIna</rdg></app> padaṅ caaṅ, ləga-loganda, hintən ma ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">caṅciṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">cacir</rdg><rdg wit="#H">ciciṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">səri</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">cəri</rdg></app>, səmu
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">imuc</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H">imut</rdg></app>,
1190 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rame</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">rapes·</rdg><rdg wit="#H">rampes</rdg>
. </app><app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Abək·na</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">catur-yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B">caturyoya</rdg></app> ṅaranya.
. </p>
. <listApp type="parallels"><app><note><!-- corresp="#SMG_21.01"--><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasanaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_21.01">SMG 21.1</ref>: <foreign>ini catur-rahayu ṅaranya, silokanya nihan, mas pirak komala hintən, kaliṅanya, mas ta ma ṅaranna, sabda tuhu təpət bənər, byakta pañcaksara, pirak ta ma ṅaranna, ambək krəta, yogya rahayu, komala ta ma ṅaranna, gəiṅna caaṅ padaṅ, heraṅ ləga loganda aṅən-aṅənna, hintən ma ṅaranna, caṅciṅ səri, səmu imut, səmu guyu, rame ambək.</foreign>.</note></app></listApp>
1195 <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_14.05">ya ta janma bijil ti nirmalaniṅ ləmah,
. <app><lem type="norm">nirmalaniṅ ləmah</lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">nirmalani L̥maḥ</add></rdg><rdg wit="#B #H #EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, pahoman,
. <app><lem type="norm">pabuntəlan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #EdASD #H">pabutəlan</rdg></app>, pamujaan,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">imah manəh, candi, <pb edRef="#A" n="26r"/> prasada</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="transposition">cadi pR̥sada, L̥maḥ manəḥ</rdg></app>,
1200 <app><lem wit="#A">liṅga liṅgir</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">liga ligi</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">liṅga liṅgih</rdg></app>, batu gaṅsa, ləmah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">biniṅba</lem><rdg wit="#B #H" cause="lexical">bənər</rdg></app>, ginave voṅvoṅan, sasapuan, sakitu saukur ləmah kaopeksa, cai kasucikən, kapavitrakən, ña keh janma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">raḥhayu ṅarana</rdg></app>, janma rampes, ya janma
. <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">krəta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">krata</rdg></app>, nu kaṅkən bijil ti nirmalaniṅ ləmah
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">ma ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, iṅət di saṅ hyaṅ siksa,
1205 <app><lem wit="#EdASD #H">mikukuh</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">mikuku</rdg></app> talatah ambu bapa, aki
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">lavan buyut</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/><unclear>·b</unclear>uyut·</rdg></app>, ñaho di siksaan mahapandita,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">magəhkən</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">maṅgiḥkən·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #H">ujarniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD">ujar iṅ</rdg></app> krəta.</p>
.
1210</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="15" xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_15">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Supreme Dharma and Moksa</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaKandangKaresian_15.01">ini carita
. <app><lem wit="#B #H">nu bəhəla</lem><rdg wit="#A">bəhala</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">bahəla</rdg></app> nu
1215 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">nañjərkən</lem><rdg wit="#B">najərkən</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ sasana
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD #H">krəta</lem><rdg wit="#B">krata</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#H">rahyaṅta</lem><rdg wit="#A">raḥhyaṁtaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">raḥ<add place="below">hyi</add>ta</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">devaraja</lem><rdg wit="#B">devara<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/></rdg><rdg wit="#H">devaratu</rdg></app>, rahyaṅta ravuṅ laṅit,
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rahyaṅta ri</lem><rdg wit="#B #H">rahhyata li</rdg></app> mədaṅ,
1220 <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rahyaṅta ri </lem><rdg wit="#B #H">rahhyata li</rdg></app> <app><lem wit="#B">mənir</lem><rdg wit="#A #EdASD">mnər</rdg><rdg wit="#H">mənər</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh catur-krəta ṅaranna, ña mana kitu ayəna, na janma
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">nu</lem><rdg wit="#EdASD #H"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> iṅət di saṅ hyaṅ darma visesa, ñaho di
. <app><lem type="norm">karaseyaaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">karasyeAnniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #H">rasyeniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdASD">karaseyan niṅ</rdg></app> janma, ya ta sinaṅguh janma
. <app><lem wit="#A #EdASD">rahaseya</lem><rdg wit="#B">rasye</rdg><rdg wit="#H">rasya</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
